text.title: Enable NSFW Content on Reddit
text.head: Enable NSFW Content on Reddit
text.p: This wikiHow teaches you how to enable adult and Not Safe for Work ( NSFW ) on Reddit using a computer , phone , or tablet . Though there 's no option to allow NSFW content in the official Reddit mobile app , your preferences from Reddit.com will carry over . Due to Google and Apple Store restrictions , some NSFW may remain unavailable in the mobile app , even after adjusting your settings .
text.head: Steps
Using Reddit on a Phone or Tablet

list.item:
Open a web browser on your phone or tablet . Although there 's no way to change your NSFW content preferences in the official Reddit app , you can get the job done in your web browser . Changes you make to your account settings on Reddit.com will carry over to the official mobile app .
If you use one of the non-official Reddit apps on your phone or tablet , you can likely still use this method to enable NSFW content for that app .

Go to
https://www.reddit.com
. This takes you to the Reddit mobile site .
Tap the menu . It 's at the top-right corner of the page .

Tap . It ’s at the top of the menu .
If you ’re already signed in , you can skip to step 7 .
Enter your login information and tap . This logs you into your Reddit account and takes you back to the Reddit mobile site .

Tap again . The drop-down menu will re-appear .
If asked to install the Reddit app , just tap the
mobile site
link at the bottom of the screen .
Tap . It 's the gear icon in the menu . This opens the same version of the settings page that you 'd see if you were using a computer .

Remove the checkmark under “ NSFW Content . ” It ’s under the “ media ” header in the first section of the page . As long as this box is unchecked , adult content will appear in your Reddit feed and search results . You ’ll still have to change a few more settings , however .
Scroll down to the " content options " heading . It ’s near the bottom of the page .

Check the boxes next to the first two " Content options . " Both of these options should be selected if you want unrestricted access to NSFW content on your phone or tablet :
“ I am over eighteen years old and willing to view adult content . ”
“ Include not safe for work ( NSFW ) search results in searches . ”
If you ’d like adult/NSFW posts to be labeled as “ NSFW ” in the feed or search results , you can also check the box next to “ label posts that are not safe for work ( NSFW ) . "

Scroll down and tap . It 's at the bottom-left corner of the page . NSFW content will now be accessible on Reddit .
It may take a little while for the changes to take effect in the mobile app . You can try logging out and back into the app if you still ca n't view NSFW content .

text.head: Using Reddit.com on a Computer

list.item:
Go to
https://www.reddit.com
in a web browser . If you ’re not already signed in to your Reddit account , click the
LOG IN
button at the top of the page to sign in now .
This method is for redditors who have n’t reverted back to the old Reddit design . If you ’ve chosen to switch back to the old design , see
this method
instead .
Click your Reddit username . It ’s at the top-right corner of the page . A menu will expand .
Click at the top of the menu .
Click the tab . It 's near the top-center part of the page .
Slide the " Adult content " switch to On . This allows NSFW content to appear in your feed and search results .

Slide the “ Safe browsing ” switch to Off ( optional ) . If this switch is On ( blue ) , NSFW/adult thumbnails and previews will be blurred in the feed and on the search page . If you want these images to be clear , turn the switch Off ( white/gray ) .
Due to regulations by the Apple App Store and Google Play Store , some NSFW content may appear blurred in the search results , even after changing these settings .

Scroll down and click . It ’s the gray button near the bottom-left corner of the page . Your Reddit options are now updated , and you will see NSFW content all across the website .
If you use the Reddit app on an Android , iPhone , or iPad , you may need to force-close the app and then re-open it before your settings take effect .

text.head: Tips

list.item: The Reddit app prevents certain types of NSFW content from displaying on the mobile app . This is because both the iOS App Store and the Google Play Store have restrictions on the kind of content that apps can display .
